food.question: I am long and yellow, monkeys love to peel me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐒 Monkeys like to eat me.
💛 My skin is yellow.
📏 I am a fruit that is long.

food.question: I am round and juicy, and sometimes red or green. You can eat me as a snack or in a pie. What am I?

hints.text: 🥧 I am good in pies.
🔴🟢 I can be red or green.
👄 You can bite into me.

food.question: I am white and cold, and I come in many flavors. You eat me with a spoon. What am I?

hints.text: 🥶 I am very cold!
🥄 You need a spoon to eat me.
🍦 I have many different flavors.

food.question: I am orange and crunchy. Rabbits love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐇 Rabbits enjoy eating me!
🥕 I am the same color as an orange.
💪 I am a root vegetable.

food.question: I am small and round, and I grow in bunches. I can be green, red, or purple. What am I?

hints.text: 🍇 I grow in bunches.
🟢🔴🟣 I can be green, red, or purple.
🍷 Juice can be made from me.

food.question: I am made from milk, and I can be hard or soft. Mice love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🧀 Mice like me a lot!
🥛 I am made from milk.
🥪 I can be put on sandwiches.

food.question: I am a fruit with a fuzzy brown skin and green flesh inside. I am sweet and juicy. What am I?

hints.text: 🌳 I grow on a tree.
🥝 My skin feels fuzzy.
🥄 I am green on the inside and you can eat me with a spoon.

food.question: I am a vegetable that looks like a small tree. You can eat me raw or cooked. What am I?

hints.text: 🥦 I look like a little tree.
💚 I am green.
🍽️ You can roast me in the oven.

food.question: I am made from wheat, and you can spread butter and jam on me. What am I?

hints.text: 🍞 You can toast me.
🌾 I am made from wheat.
🧈 You can put butter on me.

food.question: I am a fruit that grows in a spiky shell. Inside, I am sweet and juicy with a crown on top. What am I?

hints.text: 👑 I have a leafy crown.
🍍 I grow in tropical places.
🌴 I grow on a plant, not a tree.

weather.question: I fall from the sky and help the flowers grow. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 I am wet.
☔ You need an umbrella when I fall.
🌱 Plants need me to live.

weather.question: I am big and yellow and warm. I make you happy. What am I?

hints.text: ☀️ I come out during the day.
😎 You might wear sunglasses when I'm out.
🌻 Flowers grow towards me.

weather.question: I am white and fluffy and float in the sky. What am I?

hints.text: 🐑 I sometimes look like sheep.
✈️ Airplanes fly through me.
🌧️ I can bring rain.

weather.question: I am cold and white and fall from the sky in the winter. What am I?

hints.text: ❄️ You can make snowballs with me.
☃️ I can be used to build a snowman.
🧣 You need to dress warmly when I'm falling.

weather.question: I blow hard and can make the trees sway. What am I?

hints.text: 🍃 I can make leaves fall from the trees.
🪁 You can fly a kite when I am blowing.
🌬️ I am air that is moving.

weather.question: I come after rain and have many colors. What am I?

hints.text: 🌈 I have a red, orange, yellow, green, blue, indigo, and violet color.
🌞 I appear when the sun shines through the rain.
🍀 Some people think a pot of gold is at my end.

weather.question: I am loud and bright and come with thunder. What am I?

hints.text: ⚡ I am electricity in the sky.
⛈️ I happen during a storm.
😳 I can be a little scary!

weather.question: I am loud and rumble after you see a flash. What am I?

hints.text: 🔊 I am a sound.
⛈️ I happen during a storm along with lightning.
💥 I boom and shake the house!

weather.question: I am tiny frozen rain, like little balls of ice. What am I?

hints.text: 🧊 I am hard and cold.
🥶 I fall from the sky.
⚾ I'm smaller than a baseball.

weather.question: I am a big storm with swirling winds over the ocean. What am I?

hints.text: 🌀 I have a special name.
🌊 I can cause lots of damage to the coast.
💨 I'm a type of tropical cyclone.
